backend/main.mo: Defines marketplace types and actor logic for users, categories, entrepreneur profiles, products, and inquiries with access control.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features to related source files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of all frontend files for documentation or tooling use.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and custom OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes and wraps the app with theme provider and layout.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Authentication button handling Internet Identity login/logout and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal form for first‑time users to enter and save their profile information.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Inquir: Displays entrepreneur inquiries with loading skeletons and empty states.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Produc: Modal form for creating or editing a product, handling input state, validation, and submission via mutation hooks.
Displays a grid of product cards and opens the ProductEditor to add or edit product listings.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Seller: Form for creating or updating a seller's business profile with validation and category selection.
frontend/src/components/inquiries/Produc: Customer-facing form to submit inquiries about a product, sending data through a mutation hook.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: App-wide layout with header, navigation, footer, and automatic profile setup prompt.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on user identity and invalidates dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUser.ts: Derives authentication state and returns the current user's profile and login status.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, managing identity loading, login, and status.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and mutating categories, user profiles, entrepreneur profiles, and product data via an actor API.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and a custom color palette with light and dark mode CSS variables.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/CategoryBrowsePage.ts: Displays products within a selected category with loading skeletons and navigation to product pages.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Renders the entrepreneur dashboard with profile management, product management, and inquiry handling tabs.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Shows the homepage with a hero section and a category grid that links to category browsing pages.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailPage.tsx: Displays product details, seller info, and an inquiry form, with loading states and navigation controls.
frontend/src/pages/SellerProfilePage.tsx: Seller profile page that loads seller info and their products, showing details, contact, and product cards with loading states.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending colors, typography, shadows, animations, and enabling plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Project state file describing the marketplace app’s goals, features, schema version, and required image assets.
